movies3.title: Forrest Gump

movies3.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies3.description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption.

movies3.description: A brilliant but asocial mathematician struggles with schizophrenia.

movies3.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he embarks on a life-changing journey.

movies3.title: 12 Years a Slave
movies3.description: A free black man is kidnapped and sold into slavery in the 1800s.

movies3.title: Manchester by the Sea
movies3.description: A man returns to his hometown after the sudden death of his brother and struggles with his past.
